<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Zephyr Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1581)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +24

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Katapesh Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +24, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +5

**Con** +5

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _[greater healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [heavy crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=70)_ (10 bolts), _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 255

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_scimitar_ +30 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6+14 slashing plus subduing strikes

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_heavy crossbow_ +30 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d10+6 piercing plus subduing strikes

**Adroit Disarm** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The Zephyr Guard attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a creature, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll. On a critical success, the guard can also deal their scimitar damage to the creature.

**Hampering Shot** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The Zephyr Guard makes a heavy crossbow Strike that deals one additional weapon damage die. If the Strike hits, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds and is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35). These last for 1 round, or 2 rounds if the Strike was a critical success.

**Subduing Strikes**   A Zephyr Guard takes no penalty for making nonlethal attacks with a weapon that doesn't have the nonlethal trait. The guard's nonlethal Strikes against a creature that is not wielding a weapon deal an additional 2d6 damage.

</column>
name: Zephyr Guard
